#text=There were three barber 's chair lined up along the wall .
#text=Each one had a customer in it who was already getting a haircut so I had to wait .
#text=I read a magazine for about five minutes until a customer paid and left .
#text=The barber called me over , put a smock on me , and asked me how I liked my hair cut .
#text=I told him I liked it short all over .
#text=He wet my hair down with a spray bottle of water and then started cutting my hair on the top and sides with scissors .
#text=After he had thinned it out a bit , he shaved the sides and back with electric clippers .
#text=Finally , he put hot foam on my neck and used a straight razor to shave my neck and leave a clean neat hairline .
#text=He showed me how it looked in the mirror and I approved .
#text=The barber whipped off the smock and I paid him , giving him a tip as well .
#text=Now I was ready for my big date !
